Text:
Original title: The Da Vinci Code 
Released: 2006 
Genre: Thriller 
Director: Ron Howard / Ron Howard 
Cast: Tom Hanks, Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen Ian McKellen, Jean Reno Jean Reno, Paul Bettany Paul Bettani 

About the film: Robert Langdon, the renowned professor of symbolism, are invited to the Louvre, where he was killed by a museum curator. But before his death he was able to leave a number of symbols and riddles. Putting their lives at grave danger, with Langdon, Sophie Neveu, a cryptographer police, discovers a series of amazing puzzles, hidden in the works of Leonardo Da Vinci, which indicate the existence of a secret society, protecting the ancient mystery of the age which is already 2000 years old. This duo goes to Paris, London and Scotland in the exciting search for the explanation of the mysterious package.
